summary: LOSS OF POWER STEERING ASSIST WHEN TURNING TO THE LEFT.  DEALER SAYS POWER STEERING RACK IS BINDING WHEN TURNED TO THE LEFT.  WILL HAVE TO REPLACE, MY COST.  I SEE A NUMBER OF SIMILAR COMPLAINTS ON THIS SITE.  GM HAD A RECALL (11/15/2002) FOR THIS PROBLEM ON SAME MODEL YEAR FOR CAVALIER, SUNFIRE, LUMINA/VENTURE, SILHOUETTE, TRANSPORT, AND GRAND PRIX (REGAL'S SIBLING). WHAT ABOUT REGAL?
